property.name: boardTitle
property.label: Board Title
property.description: Overrides the card title shown at the top of the Kanban.

property.name: parentObjectApiName
property.label: Parent Object API Name
property.description: API name of the parent object to use when the component is placed on an app or home page (for example, Account). Leave blank to run the board in parentless mode.

property.name: parentRecordFieldApiNames
property.label: Parent Record Field API Names
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to display beside the parent record selector (for example, Industry, Owner.Name).

property.name: showParentRecordFieldLabels
property.label: Show Parent Record Field Labels
property.description: Display the field labels before each value beside the parent record selector.

property.name: parentRecordsWhereClause
property.label: Parent Records WHERE Clause
property.description: SOQL WHERE clause used to filter selectable parent records (omit the WHERE keyword).

property.name: parentRecordsOrderByClause
property.label: Parent Records ORDER BY Clause
property.description: SOQL ORDER BY clause used to sort selectable parent records (omit the ORDER BY keyword). Example: Name ASC, CreatedDate DESC.

property.name: parentRecordsLimit
property.label: Parent Records LIMIT
property.description: Maximum parent records to fetch into the selector (1-200). Defaults to 100.

property.name: defaultToMultipleParentSelection
property.label: Default to Multi-Parent Selection
property.description: When true, the parent selection mode will default to "multi-select" mode.

property.name: childRelationshipName
property.label: Child Relationship Name
property.description: Exact name of the child relationship. Each lookup field has its own unique child relationship name. For example, the child relationship name for Opportunities on Account is "Opportunities". For custom objects, be sure to include the "__r" suffix.

property.name: cardObjectApiName
property.label: Card Object API Name
property.description: API name of the related object (for example, Opportunity).

property.name: groupingFieldApiName
property.label: Grouping Field API Name
property.description: Field on the card object used to create Kanban lanes (for example, StageName). Only supports Picklist and Text fields.

property.name: cardFieldApiNames
property.label: Card Field API Names
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to display on each card. The first field becomes the card title.

property.name: cardFieldIcons
property.label: Card Field Icons
property.description: Comma-separated list of SLDS icon names or emoji codes to display beside each field (for example, account, graph, store, U+1F389).

property.name: showCardFieldLabels
property.label: Show Card Field Labels
property.description: Display field labels alongside the values on each card.

property.name: cardRecordsWhereClause
property.label: Card Records WHERE Clause
property.description: SOQL WHERE clause applied when loading related records (omit the WHERE keyword).

property.name: cardRecordsOrderByClause
property.label: Card Records ORDER BY Clause
property.description: SOQL ORDER BY clause applied when loading related records (omit the ORDER BY keyword).

property.name: cardRecordsLimit
property.label: Card Records LIMIT
property.description: Maximum card records to pull into the board (1-1000).

property.name: filterFieldApiNames
property.label: Filter Field API Names
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields that render as multi-select filters in the component toolbar.

property.name: sortFieldApiNames
property.label: Sort Field API Names
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields that users can choose for sorting in the component toolbar.

property.name: searchFieldApiNames
property.label: Search Field API Names
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to search when users type in the search box.

property.name: columnSummariesDefinition
property.label: Column Summaries Definition
property.description: Use this field to define up to 3 column summaries. Format is `[FieldApiName|SUMMARY_TYPE|Label]` and entries are separated by semicolons. Summary types: SUM, AVG, MIN, MAX, COUNT_TRUE, COUNT_FALSE. Example: `[Amount|SUM|Sum of amount];[Amount|AVG|Average amount]`. SUM/AVG require numeric fields (Number, Currency, Percent, Integer, Double). MIN/MAX allow numeric or Date/DateTime fields. COUNT_TRUE/COUNT_FALSE require Checkbox (Boolean) fields.

property.name: emptyGroupLabel
property.label: Empty Group Label
property.description: Text used for cards without a value in the grouping field.

property.name: dateTimeFormat
property.label: Date and Time Format
property.description: Java SimpleDateFormat pattern applied to date and datetime fields (for example, dd/MM/yyyy h:mm a). Leave blank to use the running user's Salesforce locale.

property.name: debugLogging
property.label: Enable Debug Logging
property.description: Enable verbose console logging for troubleshooting.
